short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report misinformation and antisemetic posts on social media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps user identify and report fake news and anti-semitism by reporting suspicious social media posts to a dedicated server for analysis.
